SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class ControllerDispatcher

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.ControllerDispatcher
All Implemented Interfaces:
ControllerInterface, LobbyControllerInterface
public class ControllerDispatcher extends Object implements LobbyControllerInterface, ControllerInterface
The ControllerDispatcher class handles the mapping between client interfaces and Controllers. It acts as a bridge between the LobbyController and Controllers.
Author:
Tommaso Trabacchin, Melanie Tonarelli, Emanuele Valsecchi, Adem Shehi
See Also:
